page.title: 11THE ELDERLY OF ALSTON MOOR
page.content: {GRISEDALE CROFT}is a residential home for the elderly, looking after 15 residents.There is an attached block providing sheltered accommodation for 12 people.The kitchen at Grisedale Croft prepares food for{"Meals on {Wheels"}service twice a week, providing around twenty meals in Alston and the surrounding area. The{Day Centre}operates two days a week,supplying meals,arranging outings and offering companionship.The {Over-Sixties}Club has forty-five members with ages to ninety-three.It meets fortnightly and has a varied programme of activities. Samuel King's School{community {service}group gives help on a weekly basis. Tasks include shopping and gardening ,but most important of all is the regular friendly contact.
